solution_line_template: He got {total_voters}*{win_percent_decimal}=<<{total_voters}*{win_percent_decimal}={votes_first_area}>>{votes_first_area} votes from the first area
He got {votes_first_area}*{multiplier_remaining_area}=<<{votes_first_area}*{multiplier_remaining_area}={votes_remaining_area}>>{votes_remaining_area} votes in the remaining areas
So in total he got {votes_remaining_area}+{votes_first_area}=<<{votes_remaining_area}+{votes_first_area}={total_votes}>>{total_votes} votes
